name: CraftUI
title: craftui.co
shortDescription: CraftUI specializes in UI/UX design and front-end development, catering to clients needing enhanced digital products. Braden Katz, with over 11 years of experience, offers award-winning design solutions that integrate aesthetic appeal with functional efficiency. Ideal for startups and established businesses looking to refine user interfaces or develop new products.
pros: High client satisfaction and job success rate
cons: No mention of team size or scalability
Focused mainly on design, less on backend

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Adobe XD
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Comprehensive design tool with collaboration features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Sketch
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Popular among Mac users for UI/UX design
